DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether prednisolone is more effective than placebo in the first six days after initiation of medication withdrawal therapy for a medication overuse headache. Another purpose is to study whether patients followed by a neurologist 1 year after withdrawal do better than patients followed by a general practitioner.
DOC.brief_title: Prednisolone in the Treatment of Withdrawal Headache in Probable Medication Overuse Headache
DOC.detailed_description: Data published BoeMG,Mygland A,Salvesen R; Neurology 2007 Jul 3;69(1):26-31
DOC.criteria: Chronic daily headache and medication overuse fulfilling International Headache Society (IHS)II criteria Pregnancy Age under 18 and over 70 years Major mental disorders
